title: style spicy bean curd
description: Ken Hom's steamed fish and spicy tofu is healthy and tasty.
ingredients: 1½ tbsp finely shredded fresh root ginger
1 tbsp ready-made whole yellow bean sauce
½ tsp salt, or to taste
170ml/6fl oz hot chicken or vegetable stock
450g/1 lb fresh soft bean curd (tofu), cut into 3.5cm/1½in cubes
2 tsp cornflour, mixed to a paste with 1 tbsp water
1 tsp Sichuan peppercorns, roasted and finely ground
